item.title: ESP8266 Using MQTT
item.description: MQTT MQTT is a lightweight publish/subscribe messaging transport designed for machine-to-machine “Internet of Things” connectivity. It’s been used in all sorts of industries from home automation and Facebook Messenger mobile app to health care and remote monitoring over satellite links. Installing MQTT Broker On Fedora $ sudo dnf install mosquitto On Debian based systems
